snippet.title: Never Grave: The Witch and The Curse - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
新作『Never Grave: The Witch and The Curse』が登場！ダークファンタジーの世界で魔女と共に戦うメトロイドヴァニア×ローグライト。建築・クラフトでキャラクターを成長させ、帽子を使って敵を操り、最大4人の協力プレイでダンジョンの最深部を目指せ！

""Never Grave: The Witch and The Curse"" - Battle alongside witches in a dark fantasy Metroidvania x roguelite world. Develop your character through building and crafting, control enemies using a unique hat-based possession system, and team up with up to 4 players to delve into the deepest depths of dungeons!

▶️ Wishlist Never Grave on Steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/2395770/Never_Grave_The_Witch_and_The_Curse/

#NeverGrave #Metroidvania #Roguelite #IndieGame
